input.sentences: took a trip into the city .
browsed a lot of nice shops .
stopped for drinks out on a nice patio .
found a quiet quaint little restaurant to have dinner in .
it was a great day in the city | which looks even more beautiful at night !
output.sentences: We decided to go to a trip to see the city.
The shops had nice clothes and a lot of options.
We stopped and had drinks on the patio which was nice.
We ate at a restaurant that was quite and quaint.
We stayed until it was night enjoying our day in the city.
